activities.title: Activities
activities.description: All activities stored within Positive Plus One

fields.description: The key given to us by an event organisor (This might not be the same as our ID)
fields.title: Foreign Key

fields.description: Options you require in order to create an event
fields.title: Event Configuration

options.description: The venue where the event is taking place
options.title: Venue

options.description: Information about the start and end times of the event
options.title: Schedule

options.description: The start date of the event
options.title: Start Date

options.description: The end date of the event
options.title: End Date

options.description: Note: This applies a IETF reference rule to the data above. If you supply this then behaviour may be unexpected. For example the rule "RRULE:BYDAY=4FR;INTERVAL=1;FREQ=MONTHLY" will cause the event to occur monthly every 4th Friday
options.title: Reoccurance Rule

options.description: A fallback location for if a venue is not included. This is a user input and may not be exact.
options.title: Location

options.description: The popularity score of the event. This is based on predicted attendance, social media conversations, and venue capacity; and ranges from 0 to 6.
options.title: Popularity Score

options.description: Whether the event is cancelled or not
options.title: Cancelled

options.description: The type of activity you are creating within Positive Plus One
options.title: Type

options.description: The style to use when processing text within the activity
options.title: Style

options.description: The content supplied, based on the supplied style
options.title: Content

fields.description: Options to secure and lockdown your content
fields.title: Security Configuration

options.description: The context in which to apply the security rules against. This is usually the ID of the original poster.
options.title: Context

options.description: The current mode for the visibility of the activity
options.title: Visibility Mode

options.description: The current mode for reactions in the activity
options.title: Reaction Mode

options.description: The allowed sharing options on this activity
options.title: Shared Mode

fields.description: Options for paid content. For example ticket prices at an event
fields.title: Pricing Information

options.description: The ID of the product if applicable. This is used to search for pricing information
options.title: Product ID

options.description: If the product is hosted on an external store, such as an event ticket. We will only know rough estimates about their pricing.
options.title: External Store Information

options.description: If the cost is known and is exact. For example (£5.00)
options.title: Cost Exact

options.description: The minimum cost for the product. For example (£5.00)
options.title: Cost Minimum

options.description: The maximum cost for the product. For example (£5.00)
options.title: Cost Maximum

options.description: The pricing strategy used by the ticket provider
options.title: Strategy

fields.description: Information about the original creator of this activity
fields.title: Publisher Information

options.description: The ID of the original creator of the post
options.title: Foreign Key

fields.description: SEO and ML based enrichment options for activities
fields.title: Enrichment Configuration

options.description: A short title for the content, used in making recommended posts
options.title: Title

options.description: Tags attached to the activity
options.title: Tags

options.description: Whether the content would be consider sensitive to the audience
options.title: Sensitive

options.description: The location from which the activity was published
options.title: Publish Location

options.description: All mentions on the activity to other users, organisations, and events
options.title: Mentions

options.description: The starting index of the mention in the activities content. Leave this blank if not known.
options.title: Start Index

options.description: The ending index of the mention in the acitivities content. Leave this blank if not known.
options.title: End Index

options.description: The organisation to include in the mention
options.title: Organisation

options.description: The user to include in the mention
options.title: User

options.description: The activity to include in the mention
options.title: Activity

options.description: The tag to include in the mention
options.title: Tag

fields.description: All media attached to the content
fields.title: Media

options.description: The type of media to attach to the activity
options.title: Type

options.description: The url to the media (if external)
options.title: Url

options.description: The priority of the media, a lower number will display higher
options.title: Priority

fields.description: The feedback as supplied by the user
fields.title: Content

fields.description: The user ID of the person supplying the feedback
fields.title: Created By

fields.description: The type of feedback the user has submitted
fields.title: Feedback Type

fields.description: The type of report on the user, is feedback is a user report
fields.title: Report Type

fields.description: The GUID being allocated
fields.title: GUID

fields.description: What the GUID is used for
fields.title: Description

guid.title: GUID
guid.description: A collection of stored GUIDs in the application, these can be used for a number of purposes

fields.description: The key used to store the notification in the users device (Not the Flamelink ID)
fields.title: Key

fields.description: The second of the notification, normally a user ID
fields.title: Sender

fields.description: The ID of the user receiving the notification, normally a user ID
fields.title: Receiver

fields.description: Whether the notification has been dismissed by the user
fields.title: Has Dismissed

fields.description: The localized title for the notification the user sees
fields.title: Title

fields.description: The body of the notification the user sees
fields.title: Body

fields.description: The icon used in the notification (if supplied)
fields.title: Icon

fields.description: The topic of the notification
fields.title: Topic

fields.description: The action which initiated the notification
fields.title: Action

fields.description: The priority set to the notification
fields.title: Priority

reactions.description: Reactions to activities in the system
reactions.title: Reactions

fields.description: The type of reaction being performed
fields.title: Verb

fields.description: The user or organisation performing the reaction
fields.title: User

fields.description: The activity this reaction is attached too
fields.title: Activity

fields.description: The parent reaction
fields.title: Parent

fields.description: The textual content of the reaction
fields.title: Content

options.description: The url to the content
options.title: Url

options.description: The priority of the media (used for ordering)
options.title: Priority

options.description: The type of media being attached
options.title: Media Type

fields.description: The owners of this relationship
fields.title: Owners

options.description: The ID of the owner
options.title: Owner ID

fields.description: Information supplied by each member about the relationship
fields.title: Members

options.description: The unique ID of the relationship member
options.title: Member ID

options.description: Whether the member has blocked this relationship
options.title: Has Blocked

options.description: Whether the member has muted this relationship
options.title: Has Muted

options.description: Whether the member has hidden this relationship
options.title: Has Hidden

options.description: Whether the member has chosen to "connect" this relationship
options.title: Has Connected

options.description: Whether the member has chosen to "follow" this relationship
options.title: Has Followed

fields.description: Whether the relationship has been blocked by either party
fields.title: Blocked

fields.description: Whether the relationship has been muted by either party
fields.title: Muted

fields.description: Whether the relationship is deemed to be "connected" by either party
fields.title: Connected

fields.description: Whether the relationship has been followed by either party
fields.title: Following

fields.description: Whether the relationship has been hidden by either party
fields.title: Hidden

fields.description: The ID of any conversation channel this relationship uses
fields.title: Channel ID

fields.description: When the initial connection between users was made
fields.title: Connection Started

fields.description: The search index generated for the application on muted relationships
fields.title: Search Index Relationship Mutes

fields.description: The search index generated for the application on blocked relationships
fields.title: Search Index Relationship Blocks

fields.description: The search index generated for the application on connected relationships
fields.title: Search Index Relationship Connections

fields.description: The search index generated for the application on followed relationships
fields.title: Search Index Relationship Follows

fields.description: The search index generated for the application on hidden relationships
fields.title: Search Index Relationship Hides

relationships.description: Relationships between a set number of users
relationships.title: Relationships

fields.description: The key for the hashtag, this will always be snake cased. For example "outdoor_sports"
fields.title: Key

ruleValue.wrongLength: is the wrong length (should be %{count} characters)

fields.description: The default localization for this tag, normally in English.
fields.title: Fallback

ruleValue.wrongLength: is the wrong length (should be %{count} characters)

fields.description: Whether to display these tags on the hub
fields.title: Promoted

fields.description: Localized versions of the tag to override default behaviour in the application
fields.title: Localizations

options.description: The ISO code for the locale
options.title: Locale

options.description: The translated user friendly tag name
options.title: Value

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Stored information about specific tags in the application

users.description: All user and organisation profiles within the application
users.title: Profiles

fields.description: The name of the user from the auth provider
fields.title: Name

fields.description: The unique display name (handle) of the user.
fields.title: Display Name

fields.description: The email address of the user from the auth provider
fields.title: Email Address

fields.description: The phone number of the user from the auth provider
fields.title: Phone Number

fields.description: The localized region of the user
fields.title: Locale

fields.description: The users Firebase push notification token
fields.title: FCM Token

fields.description: The users birthday! ♥
fields.title: Birthday

fields.description: A list of genders a user has selected
fields.title: Genders

fields.description: The users specified location
fields.title: Place

options.description: Any description given about the location
options.title: Description

options.description: The place ID for the location
options.title: Place ID

options.description: Whether the user has opted out of location
options.title: Opted Out

fields.description: The path in GCP to the users reference image
fields.title: Reference Image

fields.description: The path in GCP to the users profile image
fields.title: Profile Image

fields.description: The users selected profile colour in hexidecimal format
fields.title: Accent Color

fields.description: A short description about the user
fields.title: Biography

fields.description: Flags on the user which control what parts of their profile others can see
fields.title: Visibility Flags

fields.description: A list of opt in features available to the user.
fields.title: Feature Flags

fields.description: Administrative controls over the user
fields.title: Admin

options.description: Whether the user is banned from the platform or not
options.title: Banned

options.description: The optional localized reason as to why the user is banned from the platform.
options.title: Ban Reason

options.description: When the users ban expires
options.title: Ban Expiry

fields.description: Profiles which may have partial control over this profile (such as organisations)
fields.title: Managers

options.description: The role this member has over the profile
options.title: Role

fields.description: The unique ID of the venue (You can ignore setting this)
fields.title: Foreign Key

fields.description: The name of the venue
fields.title: Name

fields.description: The first line of the venues address
fields.title: Address First Line

fields.description: The second line of the venues address
fields.title: Address Second Line

fields.description: The city where the venue is located
fields.title: City

fields.description: The region in which the venue resides
fields.title: Region

fields.description: The country in which the venue resides
fields.title: Country

fields.description: The postal code of the venue
fields.title: Postal Code
